plot: Raji, an East Indian store owner puts viruses in his slushies in a plan to conquer the world. Since only white people eat junk food, they are to be the only ones infected. Can Raji hold his ideas when the beautiful Claire arrives?
title: 24-Seven
plot_es: Raji, an East Indian store owner puts viruses in his slushies in a plan to conquer the world. Since only white people eat junk food, they are to be the only ones infected. Can Raji hold his ideas when the beautiful Claire arrives?
plot_en: Raji, an East Indian store owner puts viruses in his slushies in a plan to conquer the world. Since only white people eat junk food, they are to be the only ones infected. Can Raji hold his ideas when the beautiful Claire arrives?
